abstract: The firm has hired Kenneth T. Berliner, a retail specialist who was most recently the president of Peter J. Solomon Company.
snippet: The firm has hired Kenneth T. Berliner, a retail specialist who was most recently the president of Peter J. Solomon Company.
lead_paragraph: Centerview Partners, one of the top boutique investment banks around, has poached yet another senior deal maker to fill its ranks.

headline.main: Centerview Partners Hires Top Deal Maker From Rival

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
